### AI for Research Week 2024

![](https://library.smu.edu.sg/sites/library.smu.edu.sg/files/banner-image/Banner_AI_Week24v02_04v.png){width="25%"}

-  Led a team of 7 in organizing AI for Research Week 2024, defining event scope, managing logistics, and overseeing speaker recruitment.
-  Co-facilitated two hands-on workshops:
    -  [Try it Together: Transcribe Your Audio with Whisper API](https://ink.library.smu.edu.sg/ai_research_week/Programme/Programme/3/) – guiding participants through real-time transcription using the Whisper API.
    -  [Try it together - AI-powered search tools: Elicit, SciSpace, Connected Papers, Researchrabbit, and Undermind.ai](https://ink.library.smu.edu.sg/ai_research_week/Programme/Programme/2/) – demonstrated advanced AI tools, including Elicit and Scispace, for improving research workflows and literature discovery.

[Visit project website](https://library.smu.edu.sg/AI4ResearchWeek#programme){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button"}

### SMU Researcher Club 

![](https://libapps-au.s3-ap-southeast-2.amazonaws.com/accounts/210297/images/smu-rc-web-banner.png){width="25%"}

-  One of the four founding member of the SMU Researcher Club, focused on fostering a collaborative research community.
-  Curate and organize events, workshops, and initiatives to engage researchers, facilitate knowledge sharing, and promote interdisciplinary collaboration within SMU.

[Visit the club website](https://smu.sg/researcherclub){.btn .btn-outline-primary .btn role="button"}

### Generate Your L(AI)brary Hackathon 2023
